short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tools by Quartyn • Adding you functions and custom themes on some websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It adding you functions and convenient settings on some websites.

You will gain access to some custom dark themes on websites you want (Yes, you can request for dark theme and I will make it and add it to the catalog.

You will also receive some useful functions on websites like YouTube and Twitch.

For YouTube, you will be able to customize this settings:
• Ad skipper - This will DON'T BLOCK ads, it will just skip ad, when it is available
• Ad muter - When video ad is showing, ad will be automatically muted so you don't have to listen to them if you don't like them.
• Image instead of ad - You are able to set an image, that will be showing instead of video ad

For Twitch, there is also some useful setting:
• Bonus points chest collector - Automatically collects bonus points chest when it is available

This extension is always open for tips & ideas. If you have any idea of how to improve QuartTools or you would love to have some other functions, you can always submit feedback in Feedback tab.
